title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1023.12 - No complete turns
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 1023.12 - No complete turns

State Regulations

No complete turns shall be made, except under the direction
of a Triborough Bridge and Tunnel Authority employee, properly identified, or a

New York City police officer. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
1023.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
